full_text: I was then able to get the total QB rolling ELO for each Super Bowl and am very happy to report my first instinct was correct! Brees-Manning is #1 all time followed by Montana-Marino. If anyone wants to see this for any other moving # average (or just total ELO), lmk #nflverse https://t.co/8JS7m8tVPI

Wanted to throw together a shiny app to keep up with the pass depth each week. Will try to make sure it stays working! 
https://t.co/ifP3u02IN0
#nflfastr #rstats #nflverse

Adding some more passing numbers to the shiny. With all the Herbert/Burrow chatter wanted to see how they were doing on 3rd down. Herbert looks to be a bit more aggressive while Burrow slightly ahead in converting 1st downs.. (min 90att) #nflverse #nflfastR #Rstats https://t.co/8qj7BlRaZF
How is Mac Jones stacking EPA-wise against his predecessors? #nflverse #ggplot2 https://t.co/Vy02bKTYrT

Yes, the Chiefs have won a bunch recently, but looking past W/L record it has to be concerning that 4 of Mahomes's 5 worst career EPA games have come recently. Could he turn it around? Ofc. But as a Mahomes Stan(and ik I'm not alone) maybe it is time to adjust priors🤷‍♂️ 
#nflverse https://t.co/MJMpowmsQQ

@nflfastR has an xYAC model with which we can calculate Air EPA + xYAC EPA. I do that for completions and leave incompletions' EPA untouched. Interceptions are also untouched (no xYAC for the return). This is the result:

#nflverse https://t.co/rRm1re81xw https://t.co/9n24l6XV1X

the patriots have won seven straight, covering in all of them by more than TD 🏈

even more impressive is that they continue to cover by margin as the hurdle for doing so has gotten priced higher and higher week-over-week relative to both preseason and lookahead lines 

#nflverse https://t.co/yT8l5s4igY

A preview infographic for the huge Pats-Bills showdown this week:
🏈 #BillsMafia have been better on offense and defense, but Pats are on a hot streak
🏈 Mac-Allen QB Battle will define the game
🏈 AFC East lead at stake

真相としては先月 #nflverse ネタの時にフォロー受けてフォロバしたがすぐ外されました
フォロー継続してましたが試合中のネタかマジかわからないanalyticsTweetがTL上出るのがノイズだったので私も外しました
まだ私に対する批判Tweetの方が見てられます、ちなみに最近再フォローされたのも知ってます
the bills and patriots are leading the league in how much garbage time they play in this year #nflverse https://t.co/kPp93rbWZ5

Another crazy week so I didn't get a chance to post this, though I promise I ran the model prior to Thursday's game (I also didn't update the title, this is after week 13). What stands out to you? #nflverse https://t.co/2zq0HRlbTr https://t.co/KlnLR9GaKP

Week 13 was another positive week for model predictions - here is week 14!  I'm not proud of the @Vikings prediction for Thursday, because both teams deserved to lose #nflverse https://t.co/cUQTerHiPP

With only three pass attempts, the Patriots recorded a -56.7% pass rate over expectation, the lowest-recorded PROE in the @nflfastR era (since 1999). The previous low was -44.9%, set last year in Week 12 by the Broncos when they didn't have any eligible QBs. #nflverse

New graph! I thought I might try to visualize how many snaps each team's preseason offensive starters (+2 more skill players) have played in 2021

Week 1 is the left-most column and the most recent game is on the far right. Darker tiles = more snaps. X = inactive

Data: #nflverse https://t.co/XSNtxNRTuU

The Steelers have received the most benefit from penalties on a net basis this season, while the Browns have been hurt the most from penalties.

Data: #nflverse https://t.co/5g1ac6gKyQ

Here's a look at QBs' completed air yards per attempt (dark green) vs. their intended air yards per attempt (light green). 

Garoppolo & Ryan have the smallest spreads between the two while Goff, Hurts, Mahomes, and Rodgers are all vying for the largest spread. 

data: #nflverse https://t.co/IGtlhcsF7d

This sunday we had two QBs making the best game of their career by EPA/play!
Kyler Murray and, yes, Garder Minshew!
